attributes.action: Legalise to Introduce Carbon Capture Technology at UK Fossil Fuelled Power Stations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to significantly reduce industrial release of Carbon Dioxide into the atmosphere,we petition the Prime Minister to introduce legislation to make Carbon Capture mandatory at UK Power Stations, using modern and developing technology and so setting a good example for other nations to follow,in order to halt and hopefully reverse global warming in the near future.
